scripts.fast-deploy: git add . && git commit -m "Fast deploy. no message" && git push -u origin main
scripts.deploy: vite build && git add -f dist && git commit -m "gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.full-deploy: vite build && git add dist && git commit -m "gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages && git add . && git commit -m "Full deploy. no message" && git push -u origin main
